Name: Parma Negroni
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water, briefly stir and serve.
Review: A long citrusy riff that takes the classic from an early evening cocktail to perhaps one to enjoy on a sunny afternoon.
History: Discovered in 2005 at Club 97, Hong Kong, China. The history and other recipes for the Negroni cocktail can be found on our Negroni cocktail page.
Nutrition: One serving of Parma Negroni contains 202 calories
